name: Automotive

description: Oil-free, clean air systems for hospitals, clinics, and pharmaceutical manufacturing.

name: Food & Beverage
description: Hygienic, contamination-free compressed air for food processing and packaging.

name: Chemical
description: Robust compressors for chemical processing, handling corrosive environments safely.
